item.title: 52 Weeks in the Word
item.description: <p><a href="https://www.moodypublishers.com/52-weeks-in-the-word/">52 Weeks in the Word: A Companion for Reading Through the Bible in a Year</a> by Trillia J. Newbell is a companion book which includes a <a href="https://www.moodypublishers.com/mpimages/Marketing/WEB%20Resources/PDFs/Study%20Guides%20and%20Leaders%20Guides/52WkBiRePn.pdf">reading plan</a> (PDF), 52 weekly reflections, prayer prompts, and space for reflection or study.</p> <p>There is also an <a href="https://www.moodyradio.org/podcasts/52-weeks-in-the-word/">accompanying podcast</a>.</p>
item.content:encoded:
52 Weeks in the Word: A Companion for Reading Through the Bible in a Year by Trillia J. Newbell is a companion book which includes a reading plan (PDF), 52 weekly reflections, prayer prompts, and space for reflection or study.

There is also an accompanying podcast.
